mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_id, p.course_id, term, exp_time, course_college, course_type, tname, t.tid, c.course_name, exp_cname FROM exp_project p, teacher t, course c WHERE t.tid = p.exp_tid AND p.course_id = c.course_id

select concat(MIN(lab_week), '-', MAX(lab_week)) FROM exp_project p, arrange a, arrange_period ap, course c where p.pro_id = a.pro_id and a.aid = ap.aid and p.course_id = c.course_id and p.pro_id = #{proId}
SELECT * FROM arrange_period WHERE aid IN (SELECT aid FROM arrange_class WHERE class_id = #{classId})
SELECT * FROM class WHERE class_id IN (SELECT class_id FROM arrange_class WHERE aid = #{aid})
SELECT * FROM class WHERE class_id IN (SELECT class_id FROM arrange_class WHERE aid = #{aid})
SELECT CONVERT(group_concat(class_name) USING utf8mb4) lab_class FROM class WHERE class_id IN (SELECT class_id FROM arrange_class WHERE aid = #{aid})
SELECT CONVERT(group_concat(class_name) USING utf8mb4) lab_class FROM class WHERE class_id IN (SELECT class_id FROM exp_class WHERE pro_id = #{proId})
